com.linkedin.helix.controller.pipeline
Interface Stage

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBaseStage, BestPossibleStateCalcStage, CompatibilityCheckStage, CurrentStateComputationStage, ExternalViewComputeStage, MessageGenerationPhase, MessageSelectionStage, MessageThrottleStage, ReadClusterDataStage, ReadHealthDataStage, ResourceComputationStage, StatsAggregationStage, TaskAssignmentStage
public interface Stage

Logically independent unit in processing callbacks for cluster changes
